title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - New hotfix - additional package updates
description:
In the previous video we looked at what has been fixed in the latest hotfix for MSFS 2020 and in addition we started the installation of the update. If you did buy the deluxe or premium package or if you bought the Junkers JU-52 there is one additional step which you need to take. In this video I will show your which step is required once you installed the hotfix.
